ring_nccl.desc: NCCL ring algorithm for Allgather: a simple peer‑to‑peer pipeline ring.

tree_nccl.desc: NCCL tree algorithm for Allgather: a balanced binary‑tree reduction.

collnetchain_nccl.desc: NCCL CollNetChain algorithm for Allgather (2.14+): chained CollNet operations for improved throughput.

collnetdirect_nccl.desc: NCCL CollNetDirect algorithm for Allgather (2.14+): direct CollNet peer communications.

nvls_nccl.desc: NCCL NVLS algorithm for Allgather (2.17+): NVLink SHARP‑offload enabled flat‑tree.

nvlstree_nccl.desc: NCCL NVLSTree algorithm for Allgather (2.18+): NVLink SHARP‑offload enabled recursive‑doubling tree.

pat_nccl.desc: NCCL PAT algorithm for Allgather (2.23+): PCI‑Atomic Tree algorithm optimized for PCIe topologies.
